biotools.summary: Oligator is a flexible interface to draw oligosaccharide structures and generate their theoretical tandem mass spectra. It is a graphical user interface to draw complex oligosaccharides, store linear notations and produce the corresponding MS/MS theoretical spectra.

bioschemas.name: Oligator
bioschemas.summary: Oligator is a flexible interface to draw oligosaccharide structures and generate their theoretical tandem mass spectra. It is a graphical user interface to draw complex oligosaccharides, store linear notations and produce the corresponding MS/MS theoretical spectra.
